entry.title: [MKS/US][Managed Kubernetes Service] - Database migration to managed IaasDB
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 15, 08:00 - 09:00 UTC

Dec 3, 22:31 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/12/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 15/12/2022 09:00 UTC
Service impact : During maintenance, it will not be possible to create/reset/update/delete a Managed Kubernetes Service cluster, add/edit/delete a nodepool or create/edit/delete IP restrictions.
Service improvement : We need to migrate the "US" KAPI database from a IaaS (infrastructure as a service ) database with privileged rights to a "normal" IaaS database (without privileged rights).

entry.title: [US][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.19
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 12, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Oct 6, 00:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/12/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 12/12/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.20).
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.20).

entry.title: [GRA5][Workflow Management] - Mistral
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 8, 13:00 - 16:00 UTC

Dec 1, 12:50 UTC
Update - Update : Referring to the last information, the affected component with this maintenance is Workflow Management. The timeline don't change.

Nov 24, 23:50 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/12/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 08/12/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : All mistral endpoints of GRA5 will be unreachable for a duration of less than 5 minutes
Service improvement : We need to migrate the Mistral services (workflow as a service for OpenStack) for one region from the current production platform to the new production platform based on Kubernetes

entry.title: [GRA/BHS][Public cloud] - End Of Life ML Serving
entry.content:
Dec 1, 12:00 UTC
Completed - We are sorry to inform you that this maintenance is postponed to another date. We will keep you updated as soon as the date is fixed.

Aug 18, 09:51 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/08/2022 15:00 UTC
End time : 01/12/2022 08:00 UTC
Comment : As part of the product lifecycle management,
We will end the Sales of ML Serving services October 4th 2022 (no more new services).
We will end the Growth of existing ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (no more new namespaces or models deployed).
We will end the Support of all ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (shutdown of the services and related backups).

Impacted customers will be notified by email about this End-Of-Life process in August (email from NIC Admin)

Perimeter:
- All ML Serving services and solutions (free or paid) worldwide.
- OVHcloud /cloud/project/{serviceName}/ai/serving/* API endpoints

NOT in the perimeter:
- AI Notebooks
- AI Training
- AI Deploy (formerly AI Apps)

Workaround: customer will be contacted to migrate to new Public Cloud Databases AI Deploy.
Migration tutorials will be provided on https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/publiccloud/ai/

Timeline:
04/10/2022 10h CEST : End of Sales
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Growth
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Support, Shutdown of all impacted services 10h CEST

We will update this task during the proposed timeline.

Aug 17, 14:10 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 17, 14:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/08/2022 15:00 UTC
End time : 01/12/2022 08:00 UTC
Comment : As part of the product lifecycle management,
We will end the Sales of ML Serving services October 4th 2022 (no more new services).
We will end the Growth of existing ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (no more new namespaces or models deployed).
We will end the Support of all ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (shutdown of the services and related backups).

Impacted customers will be notified by email about this End-Of-Life process in August (email from NIC Admin)

Perimeter:
- All ML Serving services and solutions (free or paid) worldwide.
- OVHcloud /cloud/project/{serviceName}/ai/serving/* API endpoints

NOT in the perimeter:
- AI Notebooks
- AI Training
- AI Deploy (formerly AI Apps)

Workaround: customer will be contacted to migrate to new Public Cloud Databases AI Deploy.
Migration tutorials will be provided on https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/publiccloud/ai/

Timeline:
04/10/2022 10h CEST : End of Sales
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Growth
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Support, Shutdown of all impacted services 10h CEST

We will update this task during the proposed timeline.

entry.title: [Global][Public Cloud Databases] - API Call
entry.content:
Dec 1, 10:44 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 30/11/2022 22H00 UTC
End Time : 01/12/2022 10H00 UTC
Root cause :Service update broke network on partner side preventing reliable communication between them and us
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 1, 08:53 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 30/11/2022 22H00 UTC
Service impact : API call are slow, order of new service may take more time than usual. Existing database services are not impacted and should properly work.
Ongoing actions : Our teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident

entry.title: [DE1][Public Cloud] - Managed Kubernetes Service
entry.content:
Dec 1, 10:17 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 30/11/2022 08:30 UTC
End Time : 30/11/2022 14:30 UTC
Root cause : Some Load Balancers for Managed Kubernetes Service deliveries encountered some disruptions and received ~50% of the total traffic. This situation was due to PCI instances that deploy Load Balancers for Managed Kubernetes Service that were unreachabled, it generated downtime on load balancers. Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
